[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/repository](./repository.md) &gt; [createReferencesManyInclusionResolver](./repository.createreferencesmanyinclusionresolver.md)

## createReferencesManyInclusionResolver() function

Creates InclusionResolver for ReferencesMany relation. Notice that this function only generates the inclusionResolver. It doesn't register it for the source repository.

Notice: scope field for inclusion is not supported yet

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createReferencesManyInclusionResolver<Target extends Entity, TargetIds, TargetRelations extends object>(meta: ReferencesManyDefinition, getTargetRepo: Getter<EntityCrudRepository<Target, TargetIds, TargetRelations>>): InclusionResolver<Entity, Target>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  meta | [ReferencesManyDefinition](./repository.referencesmanydefinition.md) | resolved ReferencesManyMetadata |
|  getTargetRepo | [Getter](./context.getter.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EntityCrudRepository](./repository.entitycrudrepository.md)<!-- -->&lt;Target, TargetIds, TargetRelations&gt;&gt; | target repository i.e where related instances are |

<b>Returns:</b>

[InclusionResolver](./repository.inclusionresolver.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Entity](./repository.entity.md)<!-- -->, Target&gt;
